plot: Jack Spriggs, a poor dust bowl farmer from Alabama, is determined to keep his family's land. Set during the Great Depression, record heat waves and over-farming have turned the once fertile soil into worthless dust.
title: Jack and the Dustbowl
plot_es: Jack Spriggs, a poor dust bowl farmer from Alabama, is determined to keep his family's land. Set during the Great Depression, record heat waves and over-farming have turned the once fertile soil into worthless dust.
